ai-an10:97.6.1_7: We were mighty and powerful! Having such power, so mighty and powerful!
ai-an10:97.7.1_0: With clairaudience that is purified and superhuman, they hear both kinds of sounds, human and divine, whether near or far.
ai-an10:97.8.1_0: They understand the minds of other beings and individuals, having comprehended them with their own mind. ...
ai-an10:97.8.2_0: mind with greed as ‘mind with greed’,
ai-an10:97.8.3_0: and mind without greed as “mind without greed.”
ai-an10:97.8.4_0: mind with hate as “mind with hate”,
ai-an10:97.8.5_0: and mind without hate as “mind without hate”;
ai-an10:97.8.6_0: mind with delusion as “mind with delusion”,
ai-an10:97.8.7_0: and mind without delusion as “mind without delusion”;
ai-an10:97.8.12_0: mind that is not supreme as “mind that is not supreme”,
ai-an10:97.8.13_0: and mind that is supreme as “mind that is supreme”;
ai-an10:97.8.14_0: mind immersed in samādhi as “mind immersed in samādhi”,
ai-an10:97.8.15_0: and mind not immersed in samādhi as “mind not immersed in samādhi”,
ai-an10:97.8.17_0: They understand unfreed mind as ‘unfreed mind’.
ai-an10:97.9.1_0: They recollect many kinds of past lives, that is, one, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, many eons of the world contracting and expanding. They remember:
ai-an10:97.9.1_1: one, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, many eons of the world contracting and expanding? Do you remember: ‘There, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food.
ai-an10:97.9.1_2: They recollect their many kinds of past lives, with features and details.
ai-an10:97.10.1_0: With clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, they see sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds:
ai-an10:97.10.1_1: ‘These dear beings did bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-an10:97.10.1_2: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an10:97.10.1_3: They never spoke ill of the noble ones; they had right view; and they chose to act out of that right view. When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.’ And so, with clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, they see sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-an10:97.11.1_0: And they realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an10:97.12.1_0: A mendicant with these ten factors is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of veneration with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.”
ai-an10:98.1.1_0: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with ten qualities lives comfortably in whatever region they live.
ai-an10:98.1.3_0: They are senior and have long gone forth.
ai-an10:98.1.4_0: They’re ethical, restrained in the code of conduct, with good behavior and supporters. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, they keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-an10:98.1.5_0: They’re very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned. These teachings are good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased, describing a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure. They are very learned in such teachings, remembering them, reinforcing them by recitation, mentally scrutinizing them, and comprehending them theoretically.
ai-an10:98.1.6_0: Both monastic codes have been passed down to them in detail, well analyzed, well mastered, well judged in both the rules and accompanying material.
ai-an10:98.1.7_0: They’re skilled in raising and settling disciplinary issues.
ai-an10:98.1.8_0: They love the teachings and are a delight to converse with, being full of joy in the teaching and training.
ai-an10:98.1.9_0: They’re content with any kind of robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-an10:98.1.10_0: They look impressive when going out and coming back, and are well restrained when sitting in an inhabited area.
ai-an10:98.1.11_0: They get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-an10:98.1.12_0: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-an10:98.1.13_0: A senior mendicant with these ten qualities lives comfortably in whatever region they live.”
ai-an10:99.1.1_0: Soon afterwards Venerable Upāli approached the Buddha,
ai-an10:99.1.1_2: Then the Buddha said to Upāli,
ai-an10:99.1.2_0: “Sir, I wish to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.”
ai-an10:99.2.1_0: “Upāli, remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest are challenging.
ai-an10:99.2.2_0: It’s hard to maintain seclusion and hard to find joy in it.
ai-an10:99.2.3_0: Staying alone, the forests seem to rob the mind of a mendicant who isn’t immersed in samādhi.

ai-an10:99.6.1_0: “After some time that boy grows up and his faculties mature.
ai-an10:99.6.2_0: He accordingly plays childish games such as toy plows, tip-cat, somersaults, pinwheels, toy measures, toy carts, and toy bows.
ai-an10:99.6.4_0: Aren’t such games better than what he did before?”

ai-an10:99.8.1_0: “But then a Realized One arises in the world, perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.
ai-an10:99.8.2_0: With his own insight he has seen this world with its gods, its lords of death, and its supreme beings, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans, and he makes it known to others.
ai-an10:99.8.3_0: They teach Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-an10:99.9.1_0: Whatever thought they hear the teaching, or householder’s son was reborn in a family.
ai-an10:99.9.2_0: He gains faith in the Realized One,
ai-an10:99.9.4_0: ‘Living in a house is cramped and dirty, but the life of one gone forth is wide open.
ai-an10:99.9.5_0: It’s not easy for someone living at home to lead the spiritual life utterly full and pure, like a polished shell.
ai-an10:99.9.6_0: Why don’t I cut off my hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from lay life to homelessness?’
ai-an10:99.10.1_0: After some time they give up a large or small fortune, and a large or small family circle. They shave off hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from the lay life to homelessness.
ai-an10:99.11.1_0: Once they’ve gone forth, they take up the training and livelihood of the mendicants. They give up killing living creatures, renouncing the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:99.13.1_0: They give up unchastity. They are celibate, set apart, avoiding the common practice of sex.
ai-an10:99.14.1_0: They give up lying. They speak the truth and stick to the truth. They’re honest and trustworthy, and don’t trick the world with their words.
ai-an10:99.15.1_1: He doesn’t repeat in one place what he heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, he reconciles those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-an10:99.15.1_2: They repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other.
ai-an10:99.16.1_1: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable, and agreeable to the people.
ai-an10:99.17.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training. They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-an10:99.18.1_0: They refrain from injuring plants and seeds.
ai-an10:99.18.2_0: They eat in one part of the day, abstaining from eating at night and food at the wrong time.
ai-an10:99.18.3_0: They avoid dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows.
ai-an10:99.18.4_0: They avoid beautifying and adorning themselves with garlands, perfumes, and makeup.
ai-an10:99.18.5_0: They avoid high and luxurious beds.
ai-an10:99.18.6_0: They avoid receiving gold and money,
ai-an10:99.18.15_0: They avoid running errands and messages;
ai-an10:99.18.19_0: mutilation, murder, abduction, banditry, plunder, and violence.
ai-an10:99.19.1_0: They’re content with robes to look after the body and alms-food to look after the belly.
ai-an10:99.19.2_0: Wherever they go, they set out taking only these things.
ai-an10:99.19.3_0: They’re like a bird: wherever it flies, wings are its only burden.
ai-an10:99.19.4_0: In the same way, a mendicant is content with robes to look after the body and alms-food to look after the belly.
ai-an10:99.19.4_1: Wherever they go, they set out taking only these things.
ai-an10:99.19.5_0: When I had this entire spectrum of noble ethics, I experienced a blameless happiness inside myself.

ai-an10:99.20.2_1: For this reason, they practice restraint, protecting the faculty of sight, and achieving its restraint.

ai-an10:99.20.5_0: Tasting a flavor with his tongue ...
ai-an10:99.20.6_0: Feeling a touch with his body ...
ai-an10:99.20.7_0: Knowing a thought with his mind, he doesn’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-an10:99.20.8_0: If the faculty of mind were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming.
ai-an10:99.20.8_1: the faculties of the mind, they practice restraint, protecting the faculty of mind, and achieving its restraint.
ai-an10:99.20.9_0: When I had this noble sense restraint, I experienced an unsullied bliss inside myself.
ai-an10:99.21.1_0: They act with situational awareness when going out and coming back; when looking ahead and aside; when bending and extending the limbs; when bearing the outer robe, bowl and robes; when eating, drinking, chewing, and tasting; when urinating and defecating; when walking, standing, sitting, sleeping, waking, speaking, and keeping silent.
ai-an10:99.22.1_0: When they have this noble spectrum of ethics, this noble sense restraint, and this noble mindfulness and situational awareness,
ai-an10:99.22.2_0: he frequents a secluded lodging—a wilderness, the root of a tree, a hill, a ravine, a mountain cave, a charnel ground, a forest, the open air, a heap of straw.
ai-an10:99.22.3_0: Gone to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut, he sits down cross-legged, with his body straight, and establishes mindfulness right there.
ai-an10:99.23.1_0: Giving up desire for the world, they meditate with a heart rid of desire, cleansing the mind of desire.
ai-an10:99.23.2_0: Giving up ill will and malevolence, they meditate with a mind rid of ill will, full of compassion for all living beings, cleansing the mind of ill will.
ai-an10:99.23.3_0: Giving up dullness and drowsiness, they meditate with a mind rid of dullness and drowsiness, perceiving light, mindful and aware, cleansing the mind of dullness and drowsiness.
ai-an10:99.23.4_0: Giving up restlessness and remorse, they meditate without restlessness, their mind peaceful inside, cleansing the mind of restlessness and remorse.
ai-an10:99.23.5_0: Giving up doubt, they meditate without getting rid of doubt, not undecided about skillful qualities, cleansing the mind of doubt.
ai-an10:99.24.1_0: I gave up these five hindrances, corruptions of the heart that weaken wisdom.
ai-an10:99.24.2_0: Then, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, they enter and remain in the first absorption ...
ai-an10:99.24.4_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.25.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they don’t misbehaved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.26.1_0: Furthermore, as the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, a mendicant enters and remains in the second absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of immersion, with internal clarity and confidence, and unified mind, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-an10:99.26.3_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.27.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they don’t misbehaved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.28.1_0: Furthermore, with the fading away of rapture, a mendicant enters and remains in the third absorption. They meditate with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, ‘Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.’
ai-an10:99.28.3_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.29.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they don’t misbehaved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.30.1_0: Furthermore, giving up pleasure and pain, and ending former happiness and sadness, a mendicant enters and remains in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness. ...” ...
ai-an10:99.31.1_0: “Furthermore, going totally beyond perceptions of form, with the ending of perceptions of impingement, not focusing on perceptions of diversity, aware that ‘space is infinite’, a mendicant enters and remains in the dimension of infinite space.
ai-an10:99.31.3_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.32.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they don’t misbehaved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.33.1_0: Furthermore, going totally beyond the dimension of infinite space, aware that ‘consciousness is infinite’, a mendicant enters and remains in the dimension of infinite consciousness. ...” ...
ai-an10:99.34.1_0: “Going totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they enter and remain in the dimension of nothingness. ...” ...
ai-an10:99.35.1_0: “Going totally beyond the dimension of nothingness, they enter and remain in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-an10:99.35.3_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.36.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they don’t misbehaved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.37.1_0: Furthermore, going totally beyond the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, a mendicant enters and remains in the cessation of perception and feeling.
ai-an10:99.37.1_1: And, having seen with wisdom, his defilements came to an end.
ai-an10:99.37.3_0: of a dwelling, and one of the first dwelling is finest?”
ai-an10:99.38.1_0: “When my disciples see this quality inside themselves they frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest. And they have achieved their own goal.
ai-an10:99.38.2_0: Come on, Upāli, stay with the Saṅgha.
ai-an10:99.38.3_0: If you stay with the Saṅgha you’ll be comfortable.”
ai-an10:100.1.1_0: “Mendicants, without giving up ten things you can’t realize perfection.
ai-an10:100.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:100.1.4_0: Without giving up these ten things you can’t realize perfection.
ai-an10:100.2.1_0: After giving up ten things you can realize perfection.
ai-an10:100.2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:100.2.4_0: After giving up these ten things you can realize perfection.”
ai-an10:100.2.6_0: The fifth sub-chapter on Upāli is finished.
ai-an10:100.3.3_0: He is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods,
ai-an10:100.3.5_0: The second sub-chapter on dismissing is finished.
ai-an10:101.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.
ai-an10:101.1.3_0: ‘I have secured freedom from class.’ ‘My livelihood is tied up with others.’ ‘My behavior should be different.’
ai-an10:101.1.4_0: When these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.
ai-an10:101.2.1_0: What are the teachings grouped by seven?
ai-an10:101.2.2_0: Their deeds and behavior are always consistent with the precepts. They’re content, kind-hearted, and humble. They want to train. They use the necessities of life after reflecting on their purpose. They’re energetic.
ai-an10:101.2.3_0: When those three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill these seven things.”
ai-an10:101.2.4_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-an10:102.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when the seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill three knowledges.
ai-an10:102.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by seven?
ai-an10:102.1.3_0: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-an10:102.1.4_0: When these seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill three knowledges.
ai-an10:102.1.6_0: It’s when a mendicant recollects their many kinds of past lives.
ai-an10:102.1.7_0: That is: one, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, many eons of the world contracting and expanding. They remember:
ai-an10:102.1.7_1: There, too, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food. This was how I felt pleasure and pain, and that was how my life ended. When I passed away from that place I was reborn here.’ And so they recollect their many kinds of past lives, with features and details.
ai-an10:102.1.8_0: With clairvoyance that is purified and surpasses the human, they understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-an10:102.1.9_0: And they realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.
ai-an10:102.1.10_0: When those seven awakening factors are developed and cultivated they fulfill these three knowledges.”
ai-an10:103.1.1_0: “Mendicants, relying on the wrong way leads to failure, not success.
ai-an10:103.1.2_0: And how does relying on the wrong way lead to failure, not success?
ai-an10:103.1.3_0: Wrong view gives rise to wrong thought. Wrong thought gives rise to wrong speech. Wrong speech gives rise to wrong action. Wrong action gives rise to wrong livelihood. Wrong livelihood gives rise to wrong effort. Wrong effort gives rise to wrong mindfulness. Wrong mindfulness gives rise to wrong immersion. Wrong immersion gives rise to wrong knowledge. Wrong knowledge gives rise to wrong freedom.
ai-an10:103.1.4_0: That’s how relying on the wrong way leads to failure, not success.
ai-an10:103.2.1_0: Relying on the right way leads to success, not failure.
ai-an10:103.2.2_0: And how does relying on the right way lead to success, not failure?
ai-an10:103.2.3_0: Right view gives rise to right thought. Right thought gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.
ai-an10:103.2.4_0: That’s how relying on the right way leads to success, not failure.”
ai-an10:104.1.1_0: “Mendicants, consider a person who has wrong view, thought, speech, action, livelihood, effort, mindfulness, immersion, knowledge, and freedom.
ai-an10:104.1.2_0: Whatever bodily, verbal, or mental deeds they undertake in line with that view, their intentions, aims, wishes, and choices all lead to what is unlikable, undesirable, disagreeable, harmful, and suffering.
ai-an10:104.2.1_0: Suppose a seed of neem, angled gourd, or bitter gourd was planted in moist earth. Whatever nutrients it takes up from the earth and water would lead to its bitter, acerbic, and unpleasant taste.
ai-an10:104.2.4_0: In the same way, consider a person who has wrong view, thought, speech, action, livelihood, effort, mindfulness, immersion, knowledge, and freedom.
ai-an10:104.2.5_0: Whatever bodily, verbal, or mental deeds they undertake in line with that view, their intentions, aims, wishes, and choices all lead to what is unlikable, undesirable, disagreeable, harmful, and suffering.
ai-an10:104.3.1_0: Consider a person who has right view, thought, speech, action, livelihood, effort, mindfulness, immersion, knowledge, and freedom. Whatever bodily, verbal, or mental deeds they undertake in line with that view, their intentions, aims, wishes, and choices all lead to what is likable, desirable, agreeable, beneficial, and pleasant.
ai-an10:104.4.1_0: Suppose a seed of sugar cane, fine rice, or grape was planted in moist earth. Whatever nutrients it takes up from the earth and water would lead to its sweet, pleasant, and delicious taste.
ai-an10:104.4.4_0: In the same way, consider a person who has right view ...
ai-an10:104.4.4_1: Right freedom, whatever bodily, verbal, and mental deeds have undertaken,
ai-an10:104.4.5_0: Whatever bodily, verbal, or mental deeds they undertake in line with that view, their intentions, aims, wishes, and choices all lead to what is likable, desirable, agreeable, beneficial, and pleasant.
ai-an10:105.1.1_0: “Mendicants, ignorance precedes the attainment of unskillful qualities, with lack of conscience and prudence following along.
ai-an10:105.1.2_0: An ignoramus, sunk in ignorance, gives rise to wrong view. Wrong view gives rise to wrong thought. Wrong thought gives rise to wrong speech. Wrong speech gives rise to wrong action. Wrong action gives rise to wrong livelihood. Wrong livelihood gives rise to wrong effort. Wrong effort gives rise to wrong mindfulness. Wrong mindfulness gives rise to wrong immersion. Wrong immersion gives rise to wrong knowledge. Wrong knowledge gives rise to wrong freedom.
ai-an10:105.2.1_0: Knowledge precedes the attainment of skillful qualities, with conscience and prudence following along.
ai-an10:105.2.2_0: A sage, firm in knowledge, gives rise to right view. Right view gives rise to right thought. Right thought gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.”
ai-an10:106.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these ten grounds for wearing away.
ai-an10:106.1.3_0: For one of right view, wrong view is worn away.
ai-an10:106.1.4_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong view are worn away.
ai-an10:106.1.5_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.2.1_0: For one of right thought, wrong thought is worn away.
ai-an10:106.2.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong thought are worn away.
ai-an10:106.2.3_0: And because of right thought, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.3.1_0: For one of right speech, wrong speech is worn away.
ai-an10:106.3.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong speech are worn away.
ai-an10:106.3.3_0: And because of right speech, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.4.1_0: For one of right action, wrong action is worn away.
ai-an10:106.4.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong action are worn away.
ai-an10:106.4.3_0: And because of right action, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.5.1_0: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is worn away.
ai-an10:106.5.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong livelihood are worn away.
ai-an10:106.5.3_0: And because of right livelihood, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.6.1_0: For one of right effort, wrong effort is worn away.
ai-an10:106.6.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong effort are worn away.
ai-an10:106.6.3_0: And because of right effort, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.7.1_0: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is worn away.
ai-an10:106.7.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong mindfulness are worn away.
ai-an10:106.7.3_0: And because of right mindfulness, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.8.1_0: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is worn away.
ai-an10:106.8.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong immersion are worn away.
ai-an10:106.8.3_0: And because of right immersion, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.9.1_0: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is worn away.
ai-an10:106.9.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong knowledge are worn away.
ai-an10:106.9.3_0: And because of right knowledge, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.10.1_0: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is worn away.
ai-an10:106.10.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong freedom are worn away.
ai-an10:106.10.3_0: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:106.11.1_0: These are the ten grounds for wearing away.”
ai-an10:107.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there is a country in the south called ‘Washing’.
ai-an10:107.1.2_0: They have food, drink, snacks, meals, refreshments, and beverages, as well as dancing, singing, and music.
ai-an10:107.1.3_0: There is such a ‘Washing’, I don’t deny it.
ai-an10:107.1.4_0: But that washing is low, crude, ordinary, ignoble, and pointless. It doesn’t lead to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment.
ai-an10:107.2.1_0: I will teach a noble washing that leads solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment. Relying on that washing, sentient beings who are liable to rebirth, old age, and death, to sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are freed from all these things.
ai-an10:107.2.2_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:107.4.1_0: For one of right view, wrong view is washed away.
ai-an10:107.4.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong view are washed away.
ai-an10:107.4.3_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:107.5.1_0: For one of right thought, wrong thought is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.2_0: For one of right speech, wrong speech is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.3_0: For one of right action, wrong action is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.4_0: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.5_0: For one of right effort, wrong effort is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.6_0: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.7_0: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.5.8_0: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is washed away. ...
ai-an10:107.6.1_0: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is washed away.
ai-an10:107.6.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong freedom are washed away.
ai-an10:107.6.3_0: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

Relying on this washing, sentient beings who are liable to rebirth, old age, and death, to sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are freed from all these things.”
ai-an10:108.1.1_0: “Mendicants, doctors prescribe an emetic for eliminating illnesses stemming from disorders of bile, phlegm, and wind.
ai-an10:108.1.2_0: There is such a purgative, I don’t deny it.
ai-an10:108.1.3_0: But this purgatives, sometimes works and sometimes fails.
ai-an10:108.2.1_0: I will teach a noble purgative that works without fail. Relying on that purgative, sentient beings who are liable to rebirth, old age, and death, to sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are freed from all these things.
ai-an10:108.2.2_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:108.3.1_0: “And what is the noble purgative that works without fail?
ai-an10:108.4.1_0: For one of right view, wrong view is purged.
ai-an10:108.4.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are purged.
ai-an10:108.4.3_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:108.5.1_0: For one of right thought, wrong thought is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.2_0: For one of right speech, wrong speech is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.3_0: For one of right action, wrong action is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.4_0: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.5_0: For one of right effort, wrong effort is purged.
ai-an10:108.5.6_0: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.7_0: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.5.8_0: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is purged. ...
ai-an10:108.6.1_0: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is purged.
ai-an10:108.6.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are purged.
ai-an10:108.6.3_0: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:108.6.4_0: This is the noble purgative that works without fail. Relying on this purgative, sentient beings who are liable to rebirth, old age, and death, to sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are freed from all these things.
ai-an10:108.6.4_1: experience sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.”

ai-an10:109.1.3_0: But this kind of emetic sometimes works and sometimes fails.

ai-an10:109.3.1_1: experience sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are freed from suffering,

ai-an10:109.4.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are vomited up.
ai-an10:109.4.3_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

ai-an10:110.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten qualities should be blown away.
ai-an10:110.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:110.1.3_0: For one of right view, wrong view is blown away.
ai-an10:110.1.4_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are blown away.
ai-an10:110.1.5_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:110.2.1_0: For one of right thought, wrong thought is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.2_0: For one of right speech, wrong speech is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.3_0: For one of right action, wrong action is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.4_0: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.5_0: For one of right effort, wrong effort is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.6_0: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.7_0: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.2.8_0: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is blown away. ...
ai-an10:110.3.1_0: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is blown away.
ai-an10:110.3.2_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are blown away.
ai-an10:110.3.3_0: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-an10:110.3.4_0: These are the ten qualities that should be blown away.”
ai-an10:111.1.1_0: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha,
ai-an10:111.2.1_0: “Sir, they speak of this person called ‘an adept’.
ai-an10:111.2.2_0: How is an adept mendicant defined?”
ai-an10:111.2.3_0: “Mendicant, it’s when a mendicant has an adept’s right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:111.2.4_0: That’s how a mendicant is an adept.”
ai-an10:112.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are ten qualities of an adept.
ai-an10:112.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:112.1.3_0: An adept's right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:112.1.4_0: These are the ten qualities of an adept.”
ai-an10:112.1.6_0: The first sub-chapter on ascetics is finished.
ai-an10:113.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and bad principles.
ai-an10:113.1.2_0: I’ve understood the teaching and the meaning.
ai-an10:113.1.3_0: what is contrary to the Teaching and the Monastic Law, so the Teaching should be practiced, and the meaning.
ai-an10:113.2.1_0: What are bad principles and bad principles?
ai-an10:113.2.2_0: wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
ai-an10:113.2.3_0: This is called the principle and the goal.
ai-an10:113.3.1_0: What are the teachings grouped by principle?
ai-an10:113.3.2_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:113.3.3_0: This is called the principle and the principled.

ai-an10:115.8.1_0: “Reverends, suppose there was a person in need of heartwood. And while wandering in search of heartwood he’d come across a large tree standing with heartwood. But he’d pass over the roots and trunk, imagining that the heartwood should be sought in the branches and leaves.
ai-an10:115.8.2_0: Such is the consequence for the venerables. Though you were face to face with the Buddha, you passed him by, imagining that you should ask me about this matter.
ai-an10:115.8.3_0: For he is the Buddha, who knows and sees. He is vision, he is knowledge, he is the truth, he is holiness. He is the teacher, the proclaimer, the elucidator of meaning, the bestower of the deathless, the lord of truth, the Realized One.
ai-an10:115.8.4_0: That was the time to approach the Buddha and ask about this matter.
ai-an10:115.8.5_0: You should have remembered it in line with the Buddha’s answer.”

ai-an10:116.1.1_0: Then the wanderer Ajita went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-an10:116.1.2_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
ai-an10:116.1.2_1: He went to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and told him what had happened. Then he added:
ai-an10:116.2.1_0: “Master Gotama, we have a spiritual companion called ‘The Philosopher’.
ai-an10:116.2.2_0: He has worked out around five hundred arguments by which followers of other paths will know when they’ve been refuted.”

ai-an10:119.1.1_0: Now at that time, on the observance day, Jāṇussoṇi turned back to the Buddha, took a new pair of garments, but not far from the Buddha.
ai-an10:119.2.1_0: He saw the new pair of garments head on the observance day and knead, carrying a new pair of shoes.
ai-an10:119.3.1_0: “But brahmin, how do the brahmins observed?”
ai-an10:119.3.2_0: “Master Gotama, it was the sabbath, having bathed their heads with a new pair of garments on the ground, carried off the ground, chopped off the ground, and took away the ground.
ai-an10:119.3.3_0: And when they get up three times, they stand up for it, thinking:
ai-an10:119.3.4_0: ‘I believe in Rohitassa, sir, we’ve reference to the Buddha.’
ai-an10:119.3.5_0: After many ghees, the fire gets worn out by ghee.
ai-an10:119.3.6_0: And when the night had passed, they served and satisfied them with their own hands with a variety of delicious foods.
ai-an10:119.3.7_0: That’s how the descent of descent observed by the brahmins.”
ai-an10:119.4.1_0: “The ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is quite different from that observed in the training of the Noble One.”
ai-an10:119.4.2_0: “But what, Master Gotama, is the ceremony of the Noble One?
ai-an10:119.4.3_0: Master Gotama, please teach me this.”
ai-an10:119.5.1_0: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:119.6.1_0: “Brahmin, it’s when a noble disciple reflects:
ai-an10:119.6.3_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.6.4_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong view,
ai-an10:119.7.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.7.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong thought,
ai-an10:119.8.2_0: in both this life and the next.’

ai-an10:119.9.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong action,

ai-an10:119.10.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong livelihood,

ai-an10:119.11.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong effort,
ai-an10:119.12.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.12.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong mindfulness,
ai-an10:119.13.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.13.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong immersion,
ai-an10:119.14.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.14.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong knowledge,
ai-an10:119.15.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:119.15.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong freedom,
ai-an10:119.15.5_0: That’s how the ceremony of descent observed in the training of the Noble One.”
ai-an10:119.16.1_0: “The ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is quite different from that observed in the training of the Noble One.
ai-an10:119.16.2_0: And, Master Gotama, the ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is not worth a sixteenth part of a master of the ceremony of descent observed in the training of the Noble One.
ai-an10:119.16.4_0: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
ai-an10:120.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the descent.

ai-an10:120.1.6_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:120.1.7_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong view,
ai-an10:120.1.18_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:120.1.19_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong freedom,
ai-an10:120.1.21_0: This is called the noble descent.”
ai-an10:121.1.1_0: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
ai-an10:121.1.2_0: In the same way right view is the forerunner and precursor of skillful qualities.
ai-an10:121.1.3_0: Right view gives rise to right thought. Right thought gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.”
ai-an10:122.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things, when developed and cultivated, lead to the ending of defilements.
ai-an10:122.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:122.1.3_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:122.1.4_0: These ten things, when developed and cultivated, lead to the ending of defilements.”
ai-an10:122.1.6_0: The second sub-chapter on trading is finished.
ai-an10:122.2.1_0: Three unskillful things are lack of prejuditions
ai-an10:123.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:123.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:123.1.3_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:123.1.4_0: These ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.”

ai-an10:124.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:124.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:124.1.4_0: These are the ten things that don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:125.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things are not very fruitful and beneficial apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:125.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:125.1.4_0: These are the ten things that are not very fruitful and beneficial apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:126.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:126.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:126.1.4_0: These are the ten things that don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:127.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:127.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:127.1.4_0: These are the ten things that don’t lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:128.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:128.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:128.1.4_0: These are the ten things that don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:129.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things when developed and cultivated are not very fruitful and beneficial apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:129.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:129.1.4_0: These are the ten things that when developed and cultivated are not very fruitful and beneficial apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:130.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things when developed and cultivated don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:130.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:130.1.4_0: These are the ten things that when developed and cultivated don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:131.1.1_0: “Mendicants, these ten things when developed and cultivated don’t lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.
ai-an10:131.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:131.1.4_0: These are the ten things that when developed and cultivated don’t lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.”
ai-an10:132.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:132.1.3_0: wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
ai-an10:132.1.4_0: These are the ten wrong ways.”
ai-an10:133.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:133.1.3_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:133.1.4_0: These are the ten right ways.”
ai-an10:133.1.6_0: The third sub-chapter on showing is finished.

ai-an10:134.2.2_0: wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.

ai-an10:135.0.3_0: 135. The Teaching of the Noble Ones
ai-an10:135.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the noble ones, and what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
ai-an10:135.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:135.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to recollect?
ai-an10:135.1.5_0: This is called the principle ignoble teaching.
ai-an10:136.1.1_0: “I will teach you the skillful and the unskillful ...
ai-an10:136.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:137.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the goal and the blameless.
ai-an10:137.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:137.1.3_0: And what is the goal of life as an ignoble?
ai-an10:137.1.5_0: This is called the goal of the goal.
ai-an10:137.1.8_0: This is called the goal of.”
ai-an10:138.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the Dhamma and what is not the teaching. ...
ai-an10:138.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:139.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the undefiled and the undefiled freedom of heart.
ai-an10:139.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:139.1.3_0: And what is the principle that quality?
ai-an10:139.1.5_0: This is called the principle for praise.
ai-an10:139.1.6_0: And what is the principle without defilements?
ai-an10:139.1.8_0: This is called the principle without defilements.”
ai-an10:140.1.1_0: “I will teach you the blameworthy principle and the blameless principle. ...
ai-an10:140.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:140.1.3_0: And what is the blameworthy thing?
ai-an10:140.1.5_0: This is called the blameworthy thing.
ai-an10:140.1.6_0: And what is the principle that blameless?
ai-an10:140.1.8_0: This is called the principle blameless.”
ai-an10:141.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principled. ...
ai-an10:141.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:141.1.3_0: And what is the principle that Tapussa?
ai-an10:141.1.5_0: This is called the principle for Tapussa.
ai-an10:141.1.6_0: And what is the principle that’s too learned?
ai-an10:141.1.8_0: This is called the principle for recitation.”
ai-an10:142.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the Dhamma and the principled king.
ai-an10:142.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:142.1.3_0: And what is the principle that lead to the underworld?
ai-an10:142.1.5_0: This is called the principle that leads to the underworld.
ai-an10:142.1.6_0: And what is the principle that principle?
ai-an10:142.1.8_0: This is called the principle without getting rid of the things.”
ai-an10:143.1.1_0: “I will teach you suffering and the teaching of the noble ones. ...
ai-an10:143.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:143.1.3_0: And what is the principle with suffering?
ai-an10:143.1.5_0: This is called the principle with suffering.
ai-an10:143.1.6_0: And what is the principle that brings happiness?
ai-an10:143.1.8_0: This is called the principle free of happiness.”
ai-an10:144.1.1_0: “I will teach you suffering, and the principled speech that results in suffering.
ai-an10:144.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:144.1.3_0: And what principle results in suffering?
ai-an10:144.1.5_0: This is called the principle that results in suffering.
ai-an10:144.1.6_0: And what principle results in happiness?
ai-an10:144.1.8_0: This is called the principle that results in happiness.”
ai-an10:144.1.10_0: The fourth sub-chapter on goodness is finished.
ai-an10:145.1.1_0: “I will teach you the noble path and the ignoble path. ...
ai-an10:145.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:145.1.3_0: And what is the path that helps disrespectful?
ai-an10:145.1.5_0: This is called the path for the ignoble ones.
ai-an10:145.1.6_0: And what is the noble path?
ai-an10:145.1.8_0: This is called the noble path.”
ai-an10:145.1.9_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-an10:146.1.1_0: “I will teach you the dark path and the bright path. ...
ai-an10:146.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:146.1.3_0: And what is the dark path?
ai-an10:146.1.5_0: This is called the dark path.
ai-an10:146.1.6_0: And what is the bright path?
ai-an10:146.1.8_0: This is called the bright path.”
ai-an10:147.1.1_0: “I will teach you what is the true teaching and what is not the true teaching. ...
ai-an10:147.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:147.1.3_0: And what is the true teaching?
ai-an10:147.1.5_0: This is called the true teaching.
ai-an10:147.1.6_0: And what is the true teaching?
ai-an10:147.1.8_0: This is called the true teaching.”
ai-an10:148.0.3_0: 148. The Teaching of the Good Persons
ai-an10:148.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the good persons and the teaching of the bad persons. ...
ai-an10:148.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:148.1.3_0: And what is a quality of a bad person?
ai-an10:148.1.5_0: This is called a quality of a bad person.
ai-an10:148.1.6_0: And what is a quality of a good person?
ai-an10:148.1.8_0: This is called a quality of a good person.”
ai-an10:149.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to give rise to the principle and the principle not to recollect. ...

ai-an10:149.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
ai-an10:149.1.5_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
ai-an10:149.1.6_0: And what is the principle that should be produced?

ai-an10:150.1.5_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
ai-an10:150.1.6_0: And what is the principle that should be cultivated?
ai-an10:150.1.8_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.”
ai-an10:151.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to develop and the principle not to cultivate. ...
ai-an10:151.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...

ai-an10:151.1.5_0: This is called the principle not to develop.
ai-an10:151.1.6_0: And what is the principle that should be developed?
ai-an10:152.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principle not to cultivate. ...

ai-an10:152.1.5_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.

ai-an10:152.1.8_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.”
ai-an10:153.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to recollect. ...

ai-an10:153.1.5_0: This is called the principle not to recollect.

ai-an10:154.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to be realized.

ai-an10:155.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you shouldn’t associate with a person who has ten qualities.
ai-an10:155.1.3_0: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
ai-an10:155.1.4_0: You shouldn’t associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
ai-an10:155.2.1_0: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.”
ai-an10:155.2.3_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:155.2.4_0: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
ai-an10:156-166.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you should not frequent a person who has ten qualities. ...
ai-an10:156-166.2.4_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:156-166.2.5_0: A person who has these ten qualities makes much merit.”
ai-an10:156-166.2.6_0: The first sub-chapter on individuals is finished.
ai-an10:167.1.1_0: Now at that time, on the observance day, Jāṇussoṇi turned back to the Buddha, took a new pair of garments, but not far from the Buddha.
ai-an10:167.2.1_0: He saw the new pair of garments head on the observance day and knead, carrying a new pair of shoes.
ai-an10:167.3.1_0: “But brahmin, how do the brahmins observed?”
ai-an10:167.3.2_0: “Master Gotama, it was the sabbath, having bathed their heads with a new pair of garments on the ground, carried off the ground, chopped off the ground, and took away the ground.
ai-an10:167.3.3_0: And when they get up three times, they stand up for it, thinking:
ai-an10:167.3.4_0: ‘I believe in Rohitassa, sir, we’ve reference to the Buddha.’
ai-an10:167.3.5_0: After many ghees, the fire gets worn out by ghee.
ai-an10:167.3.6_0: And when the night had passed, they served and satisfied them with their own hands with a variety of delicious foods.
ai-an10:167.3.7_0: That’s how the descent of descent observed by the brahmins.”
ai-an10:167.4.1_0: “The ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is quite different from that observed in the training of the Noble One.”
ai-an10:167.4.2_0: “But what, Master Gotama, is the ceremony of the Noble One?
ai-an10:167.4.3_0: Master Gotama, please teach me this.”
ai-an10:167.5.1_0: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:167.6.1_0: “Brahmin, it’s when a noble disciple reflects:
ai-an10:167.6.2_0: ‘Killing living creatures has a bad result in the present life and in lives to come.’
ai-an10:167.6.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up killing living creatures,
ai-an10:167.6.4_0: they descend from killing living creatures.
ai-an10:167.7.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.7.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up stealing,
ai-an10:167.8.2_0: in both this life and the next.’

ai-an10:167.9.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.9.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up lying,
ai-an10:167.10.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.10.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up divisive speech,

ai-an10:167.11.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up harsh speech,

ai-an10:167.12.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up talking nonsense,
ai-an10:167.13.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.13.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up covetousness,
ai-an10:167.14.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.14.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up ill will,
ai-an10:167.15.2_0: in both this life and the next.’
ai-an10:167.15.3_0: Reflecting like this, they give up wrong view,
ai-an10:167.15.5_0: That’s how the ceremony of descent observed in the training of the Noble One.”
ai-an10:167.16.1_0: “The ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is quite different from that observed in the training of the Noble One.
ai-an10:167.16.2_0: And, Master Gotama, the ceremony of descent observed by the brahmins is not worth a sixteenth part of a master of the ceremony of descent observed in the training of the Noble One.
ai-an10:167.16.4_0: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

ai-an10:169.1.1_0: Then the brahmin Saṅgārava went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-an10:169.1.2_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
ai-an10:169.2.1_0: “Well, Master Gotama, what is the near shore and what is the far shore?”
ai-an10:169.2.2_0: “Killing living creatures is the near shore, brahmin, and not killing living creatures is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.3_0: Stealing is the near shore, and not stealing is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.4_0: Sexual misconduct is the near shore, and sexual misconduct is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.5_0: Lying is the near shore, and not lying.
ai-an10:169.2.6_0: divisive speech is the near shore, and divisive speech is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.7_0: harsh speech is the near shore, and harsh speech.
ai-an10:169.2.8_0: Talking nonsense is the near shore, and talking nonsense.
ai-an10:169.2.9_0: Wrong view is the near shore, and not the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.10_0: Wrong will is the near shore, and good will is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.11_0: Wrong view is the near shore, and right view is the far shore.
ai-an10:169.2.12_0: This is the near shore, brahmin, and this is the far shore.

ai-an10:171.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and bad principles.
ai-an10:171.1.2_0: I’ve understood the teaching and the meaning.
ai-an10:171.1.3_0: what is contrary to the Teaching and the Monastic Law, so the Teaching should be practiced, and the meaning.

ai-an10:171.2.2_0: Killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct.

ai-an10:171.3.2_0: refraining from killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; avoiding speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical; contentment, good will, and right view.

ai-an10:172.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and good principles.
ai-an10:172.1.3_0: what is contrary to the Teaching and the Monastic Law as the Teaching, and the Teaching should be remembered.”
ai-an10:172.1.4_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-an10:172.1.5_0: When he had spoken, the Holy One got up from his seat and entered his dwelling.
ai-an10:172.2.1_0: And then, not long after the Buddha had left, those mendicants thought:
ai-an10:172.2.2_0: “The Buddha gave this brief summary, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail. ...
ai-an10:172.2.3_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
ai-an10:172.2.5_0: what is contrary to the Teaching and the Teaching, and the Monastic Law,’ they should remember it.
ai-an10:172.2.6_0: What is the detailed meaning of this brief passage for recitation?”
ai-an10:172.3.2_0: “This Venerable Mahākaccāna is praised by the Buddha and esteemed by his sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an10:172.3.3_0: You are capable of explaining in detail the meaning of this brief passage for recitation given by the Buddha.
ai-an10:172.3.4_1: Mahākaccāna and asked him about this matter.
ai-an10:172.3.5_0: As he answers, so we’ll remember it.”
