ai-an10:172.5.2_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
ai-an10:172.5.4_0: what is contrary to the Teaching and the Teaching, and the Monastic Law,’ they should remember it.
ai-an10:172.6.1_0: And soon after the Buddha had left, we thought,
ai-an10:172.6.2_0: The Buddha gave this brief passage for recitation, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail:
ai-an10:172.6.5_0: What is the detailed meaning of this brief passage for recitation?’
ai-an10:172.7.2_0: ‘This Venerable Mahākaccāna is praised by the Buddha and esteemed by his sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an10:172.7.3_0: You are capable of explaining in detail the meaning of this brief passage for recitation given by the Buddha.
ai-an10:172.7.4_1: went to him and asked about this matter.
ai-an10:172.7.5_0: As he answers, so we’ll remember it.’
ai-an10:172.8.1_0: “Reverends, suppose there was a person in need of heartwood. And while wandering in search of heartwood he’d come across a large tree standing with heartwood. But he’d pass over the roots and trunk, imagining that the heartwood should be sought in the branches and leaves.
ai-an10:172.8.2_0: Such is the consequence for the venerables. Though you were face to face with the Buddha, you passed him by, imagining that you should ask me about this matter.
ai-an10:172.8.3_0: For he is the Buddha, who knows and sees. He is vision, he is knowledge, he is the truth, he is holiness. He is the teacher, the proclaimer, the elucidator of meaning, the bestower of the deathless, the lord of truth, the Realized One.
ai-an10:172.8.4_0: That was the time to approach the Buddha and ask about this matter.
ai-an10:172.8.5_0: You should have remembered it in line with the Buddha’s answer.”
ai-an10:172.9.1_0: “Certainly he is the Buddha, who knows and sees. He is vision, he is knowledge, he is the truth, he is holiness. He is the teacher, the proclaimer, the elucidator of meaning, the bestower of the deathless, the lord of truth, the Realized One.
ai-an10:172.9.2_0: That was the time to approach the Buddha and ask about this matter.
ai-an10:172.9.3_0: You should have remembered it in line with the Buddha’s answer.
ai-an10:172.9.4_0: Still, Venerable Mahākaccāna is praised by the Buddha and esteemed by his sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an10:172.9.5_0: You are capable of explaining in detail the meaning of this brief passage for recitation given by the Buddha.
ai-an10:172.9.6_0: Please explain this, if it’s no trouble.”
ai-an10:172.10.1_0: “Well then, reverends, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:172.11.1_0: “The Buddha gave this brief passage for recitation, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail:
ai-an10:172.11.2_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles ...
ai-an10:172.12.1_0: So what are bad principles? What are good principles?
ai-an10:172.12.2_0: What are bad results? And what are good results?
ai-an10:172.12.3_0: Killing living creatures is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.12.4_0: Avoiding killing living creatures is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.12.5_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by killing living creatures are bad results.
ai-an10:172.12.6_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding killing living creatures are good results.
ai-an10:172.13.2_0: Not stealing is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.13.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by stealing are bad results.
ai-an10:172.13.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of not stealing are good results.
ai-an10:172.14.1_0: Sexual misconduct is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.14.2_0: Avoiding sexual misconduct is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.14.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by sexual misconduct are bad results.
ai-an10:172.14.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding sexual misconduct are good results.
ai-an10:172.15.2_0: Not lying is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.15.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by lying are bad results.
ai-an10:172.15.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of not lying are good results.
ai-an10:172.16.1_0: Divisive speech is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.16.2_0: Avoiding divisive speech is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.16.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by divisive speech are bad results.
ai-an10:172.16.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding divisive speech are good results.
ai-an10:172.17.1_0: Harsh speech is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.17.2_0: Avoiding harsh speech is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.17.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by harsh speech are bad results.
ai-an10:172.17.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding harsh speech are good results.
ai-an10:172.18.1_0: Talking nonsense is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.18.2_0: Avoiding talking nonsense is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.18.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by talking nonsense are bad results.
ai-an10:172.18.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding talking nonsense are good results.
ai-an10:172.19.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by covetousness are bad results.
ai-an10:172.19.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of contentment are good results.
ai-an10:172.20.1_0: Ill will is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.20.2_0: Good will is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.20.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by ill will are bad results.
ai-an10:172.20.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of good will are good results.
ai-an10:172.21.1_0: Wrong view is a bad principle.
ai-an10:172.21.2_0: Right view is a good principle.
ai-an10:172.21.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are bad results.
ai-an10:172.21.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right view are good results.
ai-an10:172.22.1_0: The Buddha gave this brief passage for recitation, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail:
ai-an10:172.22.2_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles ...
ai-an10:172.22.4_0: And this is how I understand the detailed meaning of this passage for recitation.
ai-an10:172.22.5_0: If you wish, you may go to the Buddha and ask him about this.
ai-an10:172.22.6_0: You should remember it in line with the Buddha’s answer.”
ai-an10:172.23.1_0: “Yes, reverend,” said those mendicants, approving and agreeing with what Mahākaccāna said.
ai-an10:172.23.1_1: After bowing down to the Buddha, they sat down,
ai-an10:172.24.1_0: “Sir, the Buddha gave this brief passage for recitation, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail:
ai-an10:172.24.2_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles ...
ai-an10:172.25.1_0: And soon after the Buddha had left, we thought,
ai-an10:172.25.2_0: The Buddha gave this brief passage for recitation, then entered his dwelling without explaining the meaning in detail:
ai-an10:172.25.3_0: “You should know bad principles and good principles ...
ai-an10:172.25.5_0: What is the detailed meaning of this brief passage for recitation?’
ai-an10:172.26.2_0: ‘This Venerable Mahākaccāna is praised by the Buddha and esteemed by his sensible spiritual companions.
ai-an10:172.26.3_0: You are capable of explaining in detail the meaning of this brief passage for recitation given by the Buddha.
ai-an10:172.26.4_1: went to him and asked about this matter.
ai-an10:172.26.5_0: As he answers, so we’ll remember it.’
ai-an10:172.27.1_1: went to Venerable Mahākaccāna and asked him about this matter.
ai-an10:172.27.2_0: And Mahākaccāna clearly explained the meaning to us in this manner, with these words and phrases.”
ai-an10:172.28.2_0: Mahākaccāna is astute, he has great wisdom.
ai-an10:172.28.3_0: If you came to me and asked this question, I would answer it in exactly the same way as Mahākaccāna.
ai-an10:172.28.4_0: That is what it means, and that’s how you should remember it.”
ai-an10:173.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and good principles.
ai-an10:173.1.3_0: what is beneficial and what is not the Teaching, and what is the meaning.
ai-an10:173.2.1_0: So what are bad principles? What are good principles? What are bad results? And what are good results?
ai-an10:173.2.2_0: What are bad results? And what are good results?
ai-an10:173.2.3_0: Killing living creatures is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.2.4_0: Avoiding killing living creatures is a good principle.
ai-an10:173.2.5_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by killing living creatures are bad results.
ai-an10:173.2.6_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of avoiding killing living creatures are good results.
ai-an10:173.3.2_0: Not stealing is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.3_0: Sexual misconduct is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.3.4_0: Avoiding sexual misconduct is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.6_0: Not lying is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.7_0: Divisive speech is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.3.8_0: Avoiding divisive speech is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.9_0: Harsh speech is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.3.10_0: Avoiding harsh speech is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.11_0: Talking nonsense is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.3.12_0: Avoiding talking nonsense is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.3.15_0: Ill will is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.3.16_0: Good will is a good principle. ...
ai-an10:173.4.1_0: Wrong view is a bad principle.
ai-an10:173.4.2_0: Right view is a good principle.
ai-an10:173.4.3_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are bad results.
ai-an10:173.4.4_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right view are good results.
ai-an10:173.5.1_0: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
ai-an10:173.5.3_0: what is the Teaching as not the Teaching, and the Monastic Law,’
ai-an10:173.5.4_0: That’s what I said, and this is why he said it.”
ai-an10:174.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I say that killing living creatures is threefold:
ai-an10:174.2.1_0: I say that stealing is threefold:
ai-an10:174.3.1_0: I say that sexual misconduct is threefold:
ai-an10:174.4.1_0: I say that lying is threefold:
ai-an10:174.5.1_0: I say that divisive speech is threefold:
ai-an10:174.6.1_0: I say that harsh speech is threefold:
ai-an10:174.7.1_0: I say that talking nonsense is threefold:
ai-an10:174.8.1_0: I say that covetousness is threefold:
ai-an10:174.9.1_0: I say that ill will is threefold:
ai-an10:174.10.1_0: I say that wrong view is threefold:
ai-an10:174.10.3_0: And so greed, hate, and delusion are sources and origins for deeds.
ai-an10:174.10.4_0: With the ending of greed, hate, and delusion, the sources of deeds are ended.”
ai-an10:175.1.1_0: “Mendicants, this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.
ai-an10:175.1.2_0: And how does this teaching provide a bypass, not lacking a bypass?
ai-an10:175.1.3_0: Not killing living creatures bypasses killing living creatures.
ai-an10:175.1.5_0: Avoiding sexual misconduct bypasses sexual misconduct.
ai-an10:175.1.7_0: Avoiding divisive speech bypasses divisive speech.
ai-an10:175.1.8_0: Avoiding harsh speech bypasses harsh speech.
ai-an10:175.1.9_0: Avoiding talking nonsense bypasses talking nonsense.
ai-an10:175.1.13_0: That’s how this teaching provides a bypass, it doesn’t lack a bypass.”
ai-an10:176.1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Pāvā in Cunda the smith’s mango grove.
ai-an10:176.1.3_0: Then Cunda the smith went to the Buddha.
ai-an10:176.1.4_0: “Cunda, whose purity do you believe in?”
ai-an10:176.1.5_0: “Sir, there are western brahmins draped with moss who carry pitchers, immerse themselves in water, and serve the sacred flame.
ai-an10:176.1.5_1: and I believe in his purity.”
ai-an10:176.2.1_0: “But Cunda, what kind of purity do these western brahmins advocate?”
ai-an10:176.2.2_0: “Sir, there are western brahmins draped with moss who carry pitchers, immerse themselves in water, and serve the sacred flame.
ai-an10:176.2.3_0: ‘Please, good people, rising early you should stroke the earth from your bed.
ai-an10:176.2.4_0: If you don’t stroke the earth, stroke fresh cow dung.
ai-an10:176.2.5_0: If you don’t stroke fresh cow dung, stroke green grass.
ai-an10:176.2.6_0: If you don’t stroke green grass, serve the sacred flame.
ai-an10:176.2.7_0: If you don’t serve the sacred flame, revere the sun with joined palms.
ai-an10:176.2.8_0: If you don’t revere the sun with joined palms, immerse yourself in water three times, including the evening.’
ai-an10:176.2.9_0: The western brahmins advocate this kind of purity.
ai-an10:176.2.9_1: and I believe in his purity.”
ai-an10:176.3.1_0: “The purity advocated by the western brahmins is quite different from that in the training of the Noble One.”
ai-an10:176.3.2_0: “But what, Master Gotama, is purity in the training of the Noble One?
ai-an10:176.3.3_0: Master Gotama, please teach me this.”
ai-an10:176.4.1_0: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:176.5.1_0: “Cunda, impurity is threefold by way of body,
ai-an10:176.5.3_0: and threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:176.6.1_0: And how is impurity threefold by way of body?
ai-an10:176.6.2_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:176.7.1_1: With the intention to commit theft, they take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:176.8.1_1: They have sexual relations with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian. They have sexual relations with a woman who is protected on principle, or who has a husband, or whose violation is punishable by law, or even one who has been garlanded as a token of betrothal.
ai-an10:176.9.1_0: This is the threefold impurity by way of body.
ai-an10:176.10.1_0: And how is impurity fourfold by way of speech?
ai-an10:176.10.2_0: It’s when a certain person lies.
ai-an10:176.10.2_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:176.10.2_2: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say:
ai-an10:176.10.2_8: Thus they are deliberately for the sake of themselves or for some reason.
ai-an10:176.11.1_1: After hearing these are explained to one side, so explained to another so as to divide people against each other.
ai-an10:176.11.1_2: They repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting division, delighting in division, loving division, speaking words that promote division.
ai-an10:176.12.1_1: They use the kinds of words that are cruel, nasty, hurtful, offensive, bordering on anger, not leading to immersion.
ai-an10:176.13.1_0: They talk nonsense. Their speech is untimely, and is neither factual nor beneficial.
ai-an10:176.13.1_1: It has nothing to do with the teaching or the training. Their words have no value, and are untimely, unreasonable, rambling, and pointless.
ai-an10:176.13.2_0: This is the fourfold impurity by way of speech.
ai-an10:176.14.1_0: And how is impurity threefold by way of mind?
ai-an10:176.14.2_0: It’s when a certain person is covetous.
ai-an10:176.14.2_1: They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:176.14.2_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:176.15.1_0: They have ill will and malicious intentions:
ai-an10:176.15.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings be killed, slaughtered, slain, destroyed, or annihilated!’
ai-an10:176.16.2_0: ‘There’s no meaning in giving, sacrifice, or offerings. There’s no fruit or result of good and bad deeds. There’s no afterlife. There’s no obligation to mother and father. No beings are reborn spontaneously. And there’s no ascetic or brahmin who is well attained and practiced, and who describes the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.’
ai-an10:176.16.3_0: This is the threefold impurity by way of mind.
ai-an10:176.17.1_0: These are the ten ways of doing unskillful deeds.
ai-an10:176.17.2_0: When you have these ten ways of doing unskillful deeds, then if you rise early, whether or not you stroke the earth from your bed, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.17.2_1: Whether or not you stroke the earth, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.18.1_0: Whether or not you stroke fresh cow dung, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.19.1_0: Whether or not you stroke green grass, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.20.1_0: Whether or not you serve the sacred flame, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.21.1_0: Whether or not you revere the sun with joined palms, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.21.1_1: Whether or not you revere the sun with joined palms, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.22.1_0: Whether or not you immerse yourself in water three times, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.22.1_1: Whether or not you immerse yourself in water three times, you’re still impure.
ai-an10:176.22.3_0: These ten ways of doing unskillful deeds are impure and make things impure.
ai-an10:176.23.1_0: It’s because of those who do these ten kinds of unskillful deeds that hell, the animal realm, the ghost realm, or any other bad places are found.
ai-an10:176.24.1_0: Cunda, purity is threefold by way of body,
ai-an10:176.24.3_0: and threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:176.25.1_0: And how is purity threefold by way of body?
ai-an10:176.25.2_0: It’s when a certain person gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:176.26.1_1: With the intention to commit theft, they don’t, with the intention to commit theft, take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:176.27.1_0: They give up sexual misconduct. They don’t have sexual relations with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian. They don’t have sexual relations with a woman who is protected on principle, or who has a husband, or whose violation is punishable by law, or even one who has been garlanded as a token of betrothal.
ai-an10:176.28.1_0: This is the threefold purity by way of body.
ai-an10:176.29.1_0: And how is purity fourfold by way of speech?
ai-an10:176.29.2_0: It’s when a certain person gives up lying.
ai-an10:176.29.2_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:176.29.2_2: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say:
ai-an10:176.29.2_7: Thus they are not deliberately for the sake of themselves or for some trivial worldly reason.
ai-an10:176.30.1_1: They don’t repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-an10:176.31.1_1: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable, and agreeable to the people.
ai-an10:176.32.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training.
ai-an10:176.32.2_0: They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-an10:176.33.1_0: This is the fourfold purity by way of speech.
ai-an10:176.34.1_0: And how is purity threefold by way of mind?
ai-an10:176.34.2_0: It’s when a certain person is content.
ai-an10:176.34.2_1: They don’t covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:176.34.2_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:176.35.1_0: They’re not malicious, and haven’t got all they wished:
ai-an10:176.35.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings live free of enmity and ill will, untroubled and happy!’
ai-an10:176.36.2_0: ‘There is meaning in giving, sacrifice, and offerings. There are fruits and results of good and bad deeds. There is an afterlife. There are duties to mother and father. There are beings reborn spontaneously. And there are ascetics and brahmins who are well attained and practiced, and who describe the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.’
ai-an10:176.37.1_0: This is the threefold purity by way of mind.
ai-an10:176.38.1_0: These are the ten ways of doing skillful deeds.
ai-an10:176.38.2_0: When you have these ten ways of doing skillful deeds, then if you rise early, whether or not you stroke the earth from your bed, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.38.2_1: Whether or not you stroke the earth, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.39.1_0: Whether or not you stroke fresh cow dung, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.40.1_0: Whether or not you stroke green grass, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.41.1_0: Whether or not you serve the sacred flame, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.42.1_0: Whether or not you revere the sun with joined palms, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.42.1_1: Whether or not you revere the sun with joined palms, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.43.1_0: Whether or not you immerse yourself in water three times,
ai-an10:176.43.1_1: Whether or not you immerse yourself in water three times, you’re still pure.
ai-an10:176.43.3_0: These ten ways of doing skillful deeds are pure and make things pure.
ai-an10:176.44.1_0: It’s because of those who do all these skillful deeds that gods, humans, or those in any other good places are found.”
ai-an10:176.45.1_0: When he said this, Cunda the smith said to the Buddha,
ai-an10:176.45.3_0: From this day forth, may the Buddha remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
ai-an10:177.1.1_0: And then the brahmin Jāṇussoṇi went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-an10:177.1.2_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
ai-an10:177.1.2_1: He went to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him,
ai-an10:177.2.2_0: give gifts and perform memorial rites for the dead:
ai-an10:177.2.3_0: ‘May this gift aid my departed relatives and family. May they partake of this gift.’
ai-an10:177.2.4_0: But does this gift really aid departed relatives and family?
ai-an10:177.2.5_0: Do they actually partake of it?”
ai-an10:177.2.6_0: “It aids them if the conditions are right, brahmin, but not if the conditions are wrong.”
ai-an10:177.3.1_0: “Then, Master Gotama, what are the right and wrong conditions?”
ai-an10:177.3.2_0: “Brahmin, take someone who kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-an10:177.3.3_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in hell.
ai-an10:177.3.4_0: There they survive feeding on the food of the hell beings.
ai-an10:177.3.5_0: The conditions there are wrong, so the gift does not aid the one who lives there.
ai-an10:177.4.1_0: Take someone else who kills living creatures ... and has wrong view.
ai-an10:177.4.2_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the animal realm.
ai-an10:177.4.3_0: There they survive feeding on the food of the beings in the animal realm.
ai-an10:177.4.4_0: The conditions there are wrong, so the gift does not aid the one who lives there.
ai-an10:177.5.1_0: Take someone else who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, or use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They're contented, kind-hearted, and have right view.
ai-an10:177.5.2_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of humans.
ai-an10:177.5.3_0: There they survive feeding on human food.
ai-an10:177.5.4_0: The conditions there are wrong, so the gift does not aid the one who lives there.
ai-an10:177.6.1_0: Take someone else who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:177.6.2_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the Gods of Yama.
ai-an10:177.6.3_0: There they survive feeding on the food of the gods.
ai-an10:177.6.4_0: The conditions there too are wrong, so the gift does not aid the one who lives there.
ai-an10:177.7.1_0: Take someone else who kills living creatures ... and has wrong view.
ai-an10:177.7.2_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the ghost realm.
ai-an10:177.7.3_0: There they survive feeding on the food of the beings in the ghost realm. Or else they survive feeding on what friends and colleagues, relatives and kin provide them with from here.
ai-an10:177.7.4_0: The conditions there are right, so the gift aids the one who lives there.”
ai-an10:177.8.1_0: “But Master Gotama, who partakes of that gift if the departed relative is not reborn in that place?”
ai-an10:177.8.2_0: “Other departed relatives reborn there will partake of that gift.”
ai-an10:177.9.1_0: “But who partakes of the gift when neither that relative nor other relatives have been reborn in that place?”
ai-an10:177.9.2_0: “It’s impossible, brahmin, it cannot happen that that place is vacant of departed relatives in all this long time.
ai-an10:177.9.3_0: Rather, the donor is never fruitless for the donor.”
ai-an10:177.10.1_0: “Does Master Gotama propose this even when the conditions are wrong?”
ai-an10:177.10.2_0: “I propose this even when the conditions are wrong.
ai-an10:177.10.3_0: Take someone who kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-an10:177.10.4_0: They give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, fragrance, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-an10:177.10.5_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of elephants.
ai-an10:177.10.6_0: They get food, drink, clothes, and bedding.
ai-an10:177.11.1_0: Since in this life they killed living creatures ... and had wrong view, they were reborn in the company of elephants.
ai-an10:177.11.2_0: But they gave to ascetics or brahmins ...
ai-an10:177.12.1_0: Take someone else who kills living creatures ... and has wrong view.
ai-an10:177.12.2_0: They give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, fragrance, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-an10:177.12.3_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of horses. ...
ai-an10:177.12.5_0: when they are reborn in the company of dogs.
ai-an10:177.12.6_0: They get food, drink, clothes, and bedding.
ai-an10:177.13.1_1: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of dogs.
ai-an10:177.13.2_0: But they gave to ascetics or brahmins ...
ai-an10:177.14.1_0: Take someone else who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:177.14.2_0: They give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-an10:177.14.3_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of humans.
ai-an10:177.14.4_0: There they get to have the five kinds of human sensual stimulation.
ai-an10:177.15.1_0: Since someone doesn’t kill living creatures ...
ai-an10:177.15.1_1: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of humans.
ai-an10:177.15.2_0: Since they gave to ascetics or brahmins ... they get to have the five kinds of human sensual stimulation.
ai-an10:177.16.1_0: Take someone else who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:177.16.2_0: They give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-an10:177.16.3_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the Gods of Yama.
ai-an10:177.16.4_0: There they get to have the five kinds of heavenly sensual stimulation.
ai-an10:177.17.1_0: Since someone doesn’t kill living creatures ...
ai-an10:177.17.1_1: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods.
ai-an10:177.17.2_0: Since they gave to ascetics or brahmins ... they get to have the five kinds of heavenly sensual stimulation.
ai-an10:177.17.3_0: Rather, the donor is never fruitless for the donor.”
ai-an10:177.18.1_0: He said, “It’s incredible, Master Gotama, it’s amazing!
ai-an10:177.18.2_0: Just this much is quite enough to justify giving gifts and performing memorial rites for the dead, since it’s never fruitless for the donor.”
ai-an10:177.18.3_0: “That’s so true, brahmin. It’s never fruitless for the donor.”
ai-an10:177.19.2_0: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
ai-an10:178.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the unconditioned and the path.
ai-an10:178.1.2_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:178.2.2_0: Killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct.
ai-an10:178.3.2_0: refraining from killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; avoiding speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical; contentment, good will, and right view.
ai-an10:178.3.4_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-an10:179.0.3_0: 179. The Teaching of the Noble Ones
ai-an10:179.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the noble ones, and what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
ai-an10:179.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:179.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to recollect?
ai-an10:179.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:179.1.6_0: This is called the principle ignoble teaching.
ai-an10:179.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:180.1.1_0: “I will teach you the skillful and the unskillful ...
ai-an10:180.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:180.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:180.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:181.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the goal and the blameless.
ai-an10:181.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:181.1.3_0: And what is the goal of life as an ignoble?
ai-an10:181.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:181.1.6_0: This is called the goal of the goal.
ai-an10:181.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:181.2.4_0: This is called the goal of.”
ai-an10:182.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the Dhamma and what is not the teaching. ...
ai-an10:182.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:182.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:182.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:183.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the undefiled and the undefiled freedom of heart.
ai-an10:183.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:183.1.3_0: And what is the principle that quality?
ai-an10:183.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:183.1.6_0: This is called the principle for praise.
ai-an10:183.2.1_0: And what is the principle without defilements?
ai-an10:183.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:183.2.4_0: This is called the principle without defilements.”
ai-an10:184.1.1_0: “I will teach you the blameworthy principle and the blameless principle. ...
ai-an10:184.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:184.1.3_0: And what is the blameworthy thing?
ai-an10:184.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:184.1.6_0: This is called the blameworthy thing.
ai-an10:184.2.1_0: And what is the principle that blameless?
ai-an10:184.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:184.2.4_0: This is called the principle blameless.”
ai-an10:185.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principled. ...
ai-an10:185.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:185.1.3_0: And what is the principle that Tapussa?
ai-an10:185.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:185.1.6_0: This is called the principle for Tapussa.
ai-an10:185.2.1_0: And what is the principle that’s too learned?
ai-an10:185.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:185.2.4_0: This is called the principle for recitation.”
ai-an10:186.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the Dhamma and the principled king.
ai-an10:186.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:186.1.3_0: And what is the principle that lead to the underworld?
ai-an10:186.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:186.1.6_0: This is called the principle that leads to the underworld.
ai-an10:186.2.1_0: And what is the principle that principle?
ai-an10:186.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:186.2.4_0: This is called the principle without getting rid of the things.”
ai-an10:187.1.1_0: “I will teach you suffering and the teaching of the noble ones. ...
ai-an10:187.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:187.1.3_0: And what is the principle with suffering?
ai-an10:187.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:187.1.6_0: This is called the principle with suffering.
ai-an10:187.2.1_0: And what is the principle that brings happiness?
ai-an10:187.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:187.2.4_0: This is called the principle free of happiness.”
ai-an10:188.1.1_0: “I will teach you suffering, and the principled speech that results in suffering.
ai-an10:188.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:188.1.3_0: And what principle results in suffering?
ai-an10:188.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:188.1.6_0: This is called the principle that results in suffering.
ai-an10:188.2.1_0: And what principle results in happiness?
ai-an10:188.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:188.2.4_0: This is called the principle that results in happiness.”
ai-an10:188.2.6_0: The third sub-chapter on goodness is finished.
ai-an10:189.1.1_0: “I will teach you the noble path and the ignoble path. ...
ai-an10:189.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:189.1.3_0: And what is the path that helps disrespectful?
ai-an10:189.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:189.1.6_0: This is called the path for the ignoble ones.
ai-an10:189.2.1_0: And what is the noble path?
ai-an10:189.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:189.2.4_0: This is called the noble path.”
ai-an10:189.2.5_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-an10:190.1.1_0: “I will teach you the dark path and the bright path. ...
ai-an10:190.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:190.1.3_0: And what is the dark path?
ai-an10:190.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:190.1.6_0: This is called the dark path.
ai-an10:190.2.1_0: And what is the bright path?
ai-an10:190.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:190.2.4_0: This is called the bright path.”
ai-an10:191.1.1_0: “I will teach you what is the true teaching and what is not the true teaching. ...
ai-an10:191.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:191.1.3_0: And what is the true teaching?
ai-an10:191.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:191.1.6_0: This is called the true teaching.
ai-an10:191.2.1_0: And what is the true teaching?
ai-an10:191.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:191.2.4_0: This is called the true teaching.”
ai-an10:192.0.3_0: 192. The Teaching of the Good Persons
ai-an10:192.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the good persons and the teaching of the bad persons. ...
ai-an10:192.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:192.1.3_0: And what is a quality of a bad person?
ai-an10:192.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:192.1.6_0: This is called a quality of a bad person.
ai-an10:192.2.1_0: And what is a quality of a good person?
ai-an10:192.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:192.2.4_0: This is called a quality of a good person.”
ai-an10:193.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to give rise to the principle and the principle not to recollect. ...
ai-an10:193.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:193.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
ai-an10:193.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:193.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
ai-an10:193.2.1_0: And what is the principle that should be produced?
ai-an10:193.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:194.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principle not to cultivate. ...
ai-an10:194.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:194.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
ai-an10:194.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:194.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
ai-an10:194.2.1_0: And what is the principle that should be cultivated?
ai-an10:194.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:194.2.4_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.”
ai-an10:195.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to develop and the principle not to cultivate. ...
ai-an10:195.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:195.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to develop?
ai-an10:195.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:195.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to develop.
ai-an10:195.2.1_0: And what is the principle that should be developed?
ai-an10:195.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:196.0.3_0: 196. Principles That Should Be Made Much Of
ai-an10:196.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principle not to cultivate. ...
ai-an10:196.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:196.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
ai-an10:196.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:196.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
ai-an10:196.2.1_0: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
ai-an10:196.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:196.2.4_0: This is called the principle not to cultivate.”
ai-an10:197.1.1_0: “I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to recollect. ...
ai-an10:197.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:197.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to recollect?
ai-an10:197.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:197.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to recollect.
ai-an10:197.2.1_0: And what is the principle that should be recollected?
ai-an10:197.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:198.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle to recollect and the principle not to be realized.
ai-an10:198.1.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. ...
ai-an10:198.1.3_0: And what is the principle not to be realized?
ai-an10:198.1.4_0: killing living creatures ... and has wrong view. ...
ai-an10:198.1.6_0: This is called the principle not to be realized.
ai-an10:198.2.1_0: And what is the principle that should be realized?
ai-an10:198.2.3_0: right view: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-an10:198.2.4_0: This is called the principle to realize.”
ai-an10:198.2.6_0: The fourth sub-chapter on the best of noble ones is finished.
ai-an10:199-210.1.1_0: “Mendicants, you shouldn’t associate with a person who has ten qualities.
ai-an10:199-210.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-an10:199-210.1.4_0: You shouldn’t associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
ai-an10:199-210.2.1_0: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.”
ai-an10:199-210.2.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:199-210.2.4_0: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
ai-an10:199-210.3.1_0: “Mendicants, you should not frequent a person who has ten qualities.
ai-an10:199-210.4.1_0: A person who has these ten qualities makes much bad karma. ...
ai-an10:199-210.4.4_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:199-210.4.5_0: A person who has these ten qualities makes much merit.”
ai-an10:199-210.4.6_0: The fifth sub-chapter on individuals is finished.
ai-an10:199-210.4.7_0: The fourth sub-chapter on dismissing is finished.
ai-an10:211.1.1_0: “Anyone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:211.1.3_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:211.2.1_0: They steal. With the intention to commit theft, they take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:211.3.1_0: They commit sexual misconduct. They have sexual relations with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian. They have sexual relations with a woman who is protected on principle, or who has a husband, or whose violation is punishable by law, or even one who has been garlanded as a token of betrothal.
ai-an10:211.4.1_0: They lie. They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:211.4.1_1: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say:
ai-an10:211.4.1_3: ‘Please don’t know.’ Not knowing, they say to him,
ai-an10:211.4.1_6: Thus they are deliberately for the sake of themselves or for some reason.
ai-an10:211.5.1_1: They repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting division, delighting in division, loving division, speaking words that promote division.
ai-an10:211.6.1_0: They speak harshly. They use the kinds of words that are cruel, nasty, hurtful, offensive, bordering on anger, not leading to immersion.
ai-an10:211.7.1_0: They talk nonsense. Their speech is untimely, and is neither factual nor beneficial. It has nothing to do with the teaching or the training. Their words have no value, and are untimely, unreasonable, rambling, and pointless.
ai-an10:211.8.1_0: They’re covetous. They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:211.8.1_1: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:211.9.1_0: They have ill will and malicious intentions:
ai-an10:211.9.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings be killed, slaughtered, slain, destroyed, or annihilated!’
ai-an10:211.11.1_0: ‘There’s no meaning in giving, sacrifice, or offerings. There’s no fruit or result of good and bad deeds. There’s no afterlife. There’s no obligation to mother and father. No beings are reborn spontaneously. And there’s no ascetic or brahmin who is well attained and practiced, and who describes the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.’
ai-an10:211.12.1_0: A mendicant with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:211.12.3_0: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:211.13.1_1: With the intention to commit theft, they don’t, with the intention to commit theft, take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:211.14.1_1: the one protected by her mother ...
ai-an10:211.14.1_2: even if they have sexual relations with a garland. They don’t have sexual relations with a woman who has a husband.
ai-an10:211.15.1_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:211.15.1_2: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say:
ai-an10:211.15.1_7: Thus they are not deliberately for the sake of themselves or for some trivial worldly reason.
ai-an10:211.16.1_1: They don’t repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-an10:211.17.1_1: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable, and agreeable to the people.
ai-an10:211.18.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training. They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-an10:211.19.1_1: They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:211.19.1_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:211.20.1_0: They’re not malicious, and haven’t got all they wished:
ai-an10:211.20.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings live free of enmity and ill will, untroubled and happy!’
ai-an10:211.21.2_0: ‘There is meaning in giving, sacrifice, and offerings. There are fruits and results of good and bad deeds. There is an afterlife. There are duties to mother and father. There are beings reborn spontaneously. And there are ascetics and brahmins who are well attained and practiced, and who describe the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.’
ai-an10:211.22.1_0: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an10:211.22.2_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-an10:212.1.1_0: “Anyone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:212.1.3_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:212.2.11_0: having realized it with his own insight.’
ai-an10:212.3.1_0: A mendicant with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:212.3.3_0: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:212.4.10_0: there is meaning in giving, etc.

ai-an10:216.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you an exposition of the teaching on creepy creatures.
ai-an10:216.1.2_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:216.2.1_0: “What is the exposition of the teaching on creepy creatures?
ai-an10:216.2.2_0: Sentient beings are the owners of their deeds and heir to their deeds. Deeds are their womb, their relative, and their refuge.
ai-an10:216.2.3_0: I shall be the heir of whatever deeds I do, whether good or bad.
ai-an10:216.3.1_0: Take a certain person who kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:216.3.3_0: It’s old deeds, bodily, verbal, and mental deeds are growing old, and wind.
ai-an10:216.4.1_0: Someone who could and be reborn in one of two places, I say:
ai-an10:216.4.3_0: And what is the animal realm?
ai-an10:216.4.4_0: snakes, scorpions, centipedes, people of town and country, ascetics and brahmins, and some other animals.
ai-an10:216.4.5_0: This is how a being is born from a being.
ai-an10:216.4.6_0: For what you do brings about your rebirth,
ai-an10:216.4.7_0: they experience many kinds of contact.
ai-an10:216.4.8_0: ‘Consider I say that sentient beings are coming!’
ai-an10:216.5.11_0: having realized it with his own insight.’
ai-an10:216.5.13_0: It’s old deeds, bodily, verbal, and mental deeds are growing old, and wind.
ai-an10:216.6.1_0: Someone who could and be reborn in one of two places, I say:

ai-an10:216.6.4_0: snakes, scorpions, centipedes, people of town and country, ascetics and brahmins, and some other animals.
ai-an10:216.6.5_0: This is how a being is born from a being.
ai-an10:216.6.6_0: For what you do brings about your rebirth,
ai-an10:216.6.7_0: they experience many kinds of contact.
ai-an10:216.6.8_0: ‘Consider I say that sentient beings are coming!’
ai-an10:216.6.9_0: Sentient beings are the owners of their deeds and heir to their deeds. Deeds are their womb, their relative, and their refuge.
ai-an10:216.6.10_0: I shall be the heir of whatever deeds I do, whether good or bad.
ai-an10:216.7.1_0: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:216.7.2_0: but don’t transmigrate with the body or speech of mind.
ai-an10:216.7.3_0: Their bodily action is straight and mental deeds.
ai-an10:216.8.1_0: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is virtuous is reborn in one of two places, I say:
ai-an10:216.8.2_0: There are well-to-do aristocrats, brahmins, or householders who come to stay in a family of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
ai-an10:216.8.3_0: This is how a being is born from a being.
ai-an10:216.8.4_0: For what you do brings about your rebirth,
ai-an10:216.8.5_0: they experience many kinds of contact.
ai-an10:216.8.6_0: ‘Consider I say that sentient beings are coming!’
ai-an10:216.9.1_0: Take someone else who gives up stealing ...
ai-an10:216.9.11_0: They realize the world and make it known with their own insight.’
ai-an10:216.9.12_0: but don’t transmigrate with the body or speech of mind.
ai-an10:216.9.13_0: Their bodily action is straight and mental deeds.
ai-an10:216.10.1_0: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is virtuous is reborn in one of two places, I say:
ai-an10:216.10.2_0: There are well-to-do aristocrats, brahmins, or householders who come to stay in a family of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
ai-an10:216.10.3_0: This is how a being is born from a being.

ai-an10:217.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.
ai-an10:217.1.2_0: And they’ve got rid of the wind in this very life, or at some later time.
ai-an10:217.1.3_0: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.
ai-an10:217.2.1_0: Now, there are three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.2.2_0: There are four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.2.3_0: There are three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.3.1_0: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action?
ai-an10:217.3.2_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:217.4.1_0: They steal. With the intention to commit theft, they take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:217.5.1_0: They commit sexual misconduct. They have sex with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian. They have sex with a woman who is protected on principle, or who has a husband, or whose violation is punishable by law, or even one who has been garlanded as a token of betrothal.
ai-an10:217.5.1_1: even if they have sexual relations with a garland.
ai-an10:217.6.1_0: That’s how there are three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action.
ai-an10:217.7.1_0: And what are the four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action?
ai-an10:217.7.2_0: It’s when a certain person lies.
ai-an10:217.7.2_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:217.7.3_0: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say:
ai-an10:217.7.3_2: ‘Please don’t know.’ Not knowing, they say to him,
ai-an10:217.7.3_4: ‘I don’t see any plaguence’ or for the sake of my own sake.’
ai-an10:217.8.1_1: They repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting division, delighting in division, loving division, speaking words that promote division.
ai-an10:217.9.1_1: They use the kinds of words that are cruel, nasty, hurtful, offensive, bordering on anger, not leading to immersion.
ai-an10:217.10.1_0: They talk nonsense. Their speech is untimely, and is neither factual nor beneficial. It has nothing to do with the teaching or the training. Their words have no value, and are untimely, unreasonable, rambling, and pointless.
ai-an10:217.11.1_0: That’s how there are four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action.
ai-an10:217.12.1_0: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action?
ai-an10:217.12.2_1: They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:217.12.2_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:217.13.1_0: They have ill will and malicious intentions:
ai-an10:217.13.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings be killed, slaughtered, slain, destroyed, or annihilated!’
ai-an10:217.14.2_0: there’s no meaning in giving, etc.
ai-an10:217.15.1_0: That’s how there are three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action.
ai-an10:217.16.1_0: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.16.1_1: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these four kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.16.1_2: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.17.1_0: It’s like a guaranteed jeweled earrings that has been set aside, but it landed on the ground.
ai-an10:217.17.2_0: In the same way, when their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.17.2_1: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these four kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.17.2_2: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell because of these three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action, these four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action, or these three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.18.1_0: I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.
ai-an10:217.18.2_0: And they’ve got rid of the wind in this very life, or at some later time.
ai-an10:217.18.3_0: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.
ai-an10:217.19.1_0: Now, there are three kinds of successful bodily action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.19.2_0: there are four kinds of successful verbal action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.19.3_0: These three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.20.1_0: And what are the three kinds of successful bodily action?
ai-an10:217.20.2_0: It’s when a certain person gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:217.21.1_0: They don’t steal. They don’t, with the intention to commit theft, take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:217.22.1_1: the one protected by her mother ...
ai-an10:217.22.1_2: even if they have sexual relations with a garland. They don’t have sexual relations with a woman who has a husband.
ai-an10:217.23.1_0: That’s how there are three kinds of successful bodily action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.24.1_0: And what are the four kinds of successful verbal action?
ai-an10:217.24.2_0: It’s when a certain person gives up lying.
ai-an10:217.24.2_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:217.24.2_5: ‘I’ll under the sway of this’, or ‘I’m full of cause or reason for the sake of my own reason.
ai-an10:217.25.1_1: They don’t repeat in one place what they heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, they reconcile those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-an10:217.26.1_1: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable, and agreeable to the people.
ai-an10:217.27.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training. They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-an10:217.28.1_0: That’s how there are four kinds of successful verbal action.
ai-an10:217.29.1_0: And what are the three kinds of successful mental action?
ai-an10:217.29.2_1: They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:217.29.2_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:217.30.1_0: They’re not malicious, and haven’t got all they wished:
ai-an10:217.30.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings live free of enmity and ill will, untroubled and happy!’
ai-an10:217.31.2_0: Suppose there is meaning in giving,
ai-an10:217.31.2_1: They realize the world and make it known with their own insight.’
ai-an10:217.32.1_0: That’s how there are three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.33.1_0: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these three kinds of successful bodily action, these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.33.1_1: Some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm because of these four kinds of successful verbal action,
ai-an10:217.33.1_2: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these three kinds of successful bodily action, these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.34.1_0: It’s like a guaranteed jeweled earrings that has been set aside, but it landed on the ground.
ai-an10:217.34.2_0: In the same way, when their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these three kinds of successful bodily action, these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.34.2_1: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.34.2_2: When their body breaks up, after death, sentient beings are reborn in a good place, in heaven because of these three kinds of successful bodily action, these four kinds of successful verbal action, or these three kinds of successful mental action that have skillful intention, with happiness as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.34.3_0: I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.
ai-an10:217.34.4_0: And they’ve got rid of the wind in this very life, or at some later time.
ai-an10:217.34.5_0: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.”

ai-an10:219.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.

ai-an10:219.1.3_0: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.
ai-an10:219.2.1_0: That noble disciple is rid of desire, rid of ill will, unconfused, aware, and mindful.
ai-an10:219.2.1_1: In the same way above, below, across, everywhere, all around, they spread a heart full of love to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will.
ai-an10:219.3.2_0: ‘My mind was undeveloped; this was my mind, but now it is limitless.
ai-an10:219.3.2_1: Any deed that emerges from giving is done nothing wrong, and it won’t remain or persist there.’
ai-an10:219.4.2_0: Suppose a child had developed the heart’s release by love from their childhood on. Would they still do any bad deed?”
ai-an10:219.5.3_0: For it’s because they do bad deeds.
ai-an10:219.6.1_0: “This heart’s release by love should be developed by women or men.
ai-an10:219.6.2_0: they’ve got rid of a woman or a man to go to the place of loss.
ai-an10:219.6.5_0: ‘They have done anything for me because of this bad deeds.
ai-an10:219.6.7_0: The heart’s release by love developed in this way leads to non-return for a wise mendicant here who has not penetrated to a higher freedom.
ai-an10:219.7.2_0: I meditate spreading a heart full of rejoicing to one direction, and to the second, and to the third, and to the fourth. In the same way above, below, across, everywhere, all around, I spread a heart full of rejoicing to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will.
ai-an10:219.7.3_0: They meditate spreading a heart full of equanimity to one direction, and to the second, and to the third, and to the fourth.
ai-an10:219.7.4_0: In the same way above, below, across, everywhere, all around, they spread a heart full of equanimity to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will.
ai-an10:219.8.2_0: ‘My mind was undeveloped; this was my mind, but now it is limitless.
ai-an10:219.8.2_1: Any deed that emerges from giving is done nothing wrong, and it won’t remain or persist there.’
ai-an10:219.9.2_0: Suppose a child had developed the heart’s release by equanimity from their childhood on. Would they still do any bad deed?”
ai-an10:219.10.3_0: For it’s because they do bad deeds.

ai-an10:219.11.2_0: they’ve got rid of a woman or a man to go to the place of loss.

ai-an10:220.1.1_0: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-an10:220.1.2_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
ai-an10:220.1.2_1: Seated to one side he said to the Buddha:
ai-an10:220.1.3_0: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell?”
ai-an10:220.1.4_0: “Unprincipled and immoral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-an10:220.2.1_0: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”
ai-an10:220.2.2_0: “Unprincipled and moral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-an10:220.3.1_0: “I don’t understand the detailed meaning of what Master Gotama has said in brief.
ai-an10:220.3.2_0: Please, Master Gotama, teach me this matter so I can understand the detailed meaning.”
ai-an10:220.3.3_0: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:220.4.1_0: “Brahmin, unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of body,
ai-an10:220.4.3_0: and threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:220.5.1_0: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct threefold by way of body? ...
ai-an10:220.5.2_0: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of body.
ai-an10:220.6.1_0: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct fourfold by way of speech? ...
ai-an10:220.6.2_0: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is fourfold by way of speech.
ai-an10:220.7.1_0: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct threefold by way of mind? ...
ai-an10:220.7.2_0: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:220.7.3_0: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-an10:220.8.1_0: Principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of body,
ai-an10:220.8.3_0: and threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:220.9.1_0: And how is principled and moral conduct threefold by way of body? ...
ai-an10:220.9.2_0: That’s how principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of body.
ai-an10:220.10.1_0: And how is principled and moral conduct fourfold by way of speech? ...
ai-an10:220.10.2_0: That’s how principled and moral conduct is fourfold by way of speech.
ai-an10:220.11.1_0: And how is principled and moral conduct threefold by way of mind? ...
ai-an10:220.11.2_0: That’s how principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of mind.
ai-an10:220.11.3_0: That’s how principled and moral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-an10:220.12.2_0: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”
ai-an10:220.12.4_0: The first sub-chapter on compassion is finished.
ai-an10:221.1.1_0: “Anyone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:221.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-an10:221.2.1_0: A mendicant with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:221.2.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:221.2.4_0: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
ai-an10:222.1.1_0: “Someone with twenty qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:222.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view. And they encourage others to do these things.
ai-an10:222.1.4_0: They steal. They encourage others to steal. And they approve of stealing.
ai-an10:222.1.5_0: They commit sexual misconduct. They encourage others to commit sexual misconduct. And they approve of committing sexual misconduct.
ai-an10:222.1.6_0: They lie. They encourage others to lie. And they approve of lying.
ai-an10:222.1.7_0: They speak divisively. They encourage others to speak divisively. And they approve of speaking divisively.
ai-an10:222.1.8_0: They speak harshly. They encourage others to speak harshly. And they approve of speaking harshly.
ai-an10:222.1.9_0: They talk nonsense. They encourage others to talk nonsense.
ai-an10:222.1.10_0: They’re covetous. They encourage others to be covetous. And they approve of covetousness.
ai-an10:222.1.11_0: They themselves have ill will and malicious intent. They encourage others to have ill will.
ai-an10:222.1.12_0: They themselves have wrong view. And they encourage others to have wrong view.
ai-an10:222.1.13_0: Someone with these twenty qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:222.2.1_0: Someone with twenty qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:222.2.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view. And they encourage others to do these things.
ai-an10:222.2.4_0: They don’t steal. They encourage others to not steal. And they approve of not stealing.
ai-an10:222.2.5_0: They don’t commit sexual misconduct, or lie. They encourage others to not commit sexual misconduct.
ai-an10:222.2.6_0: They don’t lie. They encourage others to not lie. And they approve of not lying.
ai-an10:222.2.7_0: They don’t themselves speak divisively. They encourage others to not speak divisively.
ai-an10:222.2.8_0: They don’t themselves speak harshly. They encourage others to not speak harshly. And they approve of not speaking harshly.
ai-an10:222.2.9_0: They don’t themselves talk nonsense. They encourage others to not talk nonsense.
ai-an10:222.2.10_0: They’re content, kind-hearted, and encourage others to do the same.
ai-an10:222.2.11_0: They’re not malicious, and encourage others to have good will.
ai-an10:222.2.12_0: They themselves have right view. They encourage others to have right view. And they approve of right view.
ai-an10:222.2.13_0: Someone with these twenty qualities is raised up to heaven.”

ai-an10:224.1.1_0: “Someone with forty qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:224.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view. They encourage others to do these things. They approve of these things. And they praise these things.
ai-an10:224.1.8_0: They themselves speak harshly. They encourage others to speak harshly. And they approve of speaking harshly.
ai-an10:224.1.9_0: They themselves talk nonsense. They encourage others to talk nonsense. And they approve of talking nonsense.
ai-an10:224.1.12_0: They themselves have wrong view; they encourage others to have wrong view; they approve of wrong view; and they praise wrong view.
ai-an10:224.1.13_0: Someone with these forty qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:224.2.1_0: Someone with forty qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:224.2.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view. They encourage others to do these things. They approve of these things. And they praise these things.
ai-an10:224.2.5_0: They don’t themselves commit sexual misconduct ...
ai-an10:224.2.8_0: They don’t themselves speak harshly. They encourage others to not speak harshly. And they approve of not speaking harshly.
ai-an10:224.2.9_0: They don’t themselves talk nonsense. They encourage others to not talk nonsense. And they approve of not talking nonsense.
ai-an10:224.2.10_0: They themselves are content. They encourage others to be contented. They approve of being contented. And they praise contentment.
ai-an10:224.2.12_0: They themselves have right view; they encourage others to have right view; they approve of right view; and they praise right view.
ai-an10:224.2.13_0: Someone with these forty qualities is raised up to heaven.”

ai-an10:237.1.1_0: “For insight into greed, ten things should be developed.
ai-an10:237.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:237.1.3_0: The perceptions of ugliness, death, repulsiveness of food, dissatisfaction with the whole world, impermanence, suffering in impermanence, not-self in suffering, giving up, fading away, and cessation.
ai-an10:237.1.4_0: For insight into greed, these ten things should be developed.”
ai-an10:238.1.1_0: “For insight into greed, ten things should be developed.
ai-an10:238.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:238.1.3_0: The perceptions of impermanence, not-self, death, repulsiveness of food, dissatisfaction with the whole world, a skeleton, a worm-infested corpse, a livid corpse, a split open corpse, and a bloated corpse.
ai-an10:238.1.4_0: For insight into greed, these ten things should be developed.”
ai-an10:239.1.1_0: “For insight into greed, ten things should be developed.
ai-an10:239.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by ten?
ai-an10:239.1.3_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-an10:239.1.4_0: For insight into greed, these ten things should be developed.”
